message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This product holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. I understand its worth to you is $12,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands in the long run and significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
